name: Ghost! Flower~ Octopus<3
description:
This game was made in a period of seven days all on my own, it was to encourage myself to actually finish something.

Though it was made in so short a time I did put my all into it, I know it's not amazing but I hope when you play you don't feel like you've wasted your time.

The game is very short with six endings. It wasn't meant to be a romance but there is a tiny bit at the end.

Three unique backgrounds were planned for the three girls endings but I ran out of time, this has helped me to understand what I can accomplish in a week.

No music, I haven't figured that out yet.

I like to believe that I can only improve, please feel free to offer criticisms and advice, thank you for giving my game a try.
